name: WAR on TERROR (itch)
description:
It's a short game I wrote for "DTF Hackathon 2020".

You play as a government agent who is assigned to shoot terrorists on the street, but they are so far away that you can't see their faces clearly. Thank god, you know the type and color of underwear they wear. With a trusty SEE-THROUGH-CLOTHES-O-TRON you can find the bad guy.

Earn money, eliminate threats, kill as few civilians as possible.

No, seriously, you lose 100 bucks for each innocent life taken!

There's no sound, but there are achievements!
